formattedAddress: 60 St James Pl, New York, NY 10038, USA

originalText.text:
I walked in to this office wanting to refill my contact lenses. Things went exceptionally smoothly. There was no wait time, I got to do my eye exam right way, and they even checked my insurance benefits and got a whole year supply of contact lenses that fits my prescriptions better than before.
The staff are very kind and helpful, the doctor was very professional and detail oriented. I had a great visit here.

The staff are very kind and helpful, the doctor was very professional and detail oriented. I had a great visit here.

originalText.text: Dr. K. Neillands is a very patient,  thorough,  and detail oriented physician. I especially appreciate her taking the time to explain everything including some of the images she took during the visit. Highly recommend this doctor for all your eye care needs.

text.text: Dr. K. Neillands is a very patient,  thorough,  and detail oriented physician. I especially appreciate her taking the time to explain everything including some of the images she took during the visit. Highly recommend this doctor for all your eye care needs.

originalText.text:
One of the most best experiences as a mother who has struggled to find a pediatric ophthalmologist for my autistic son.

We were warmly greeted by two receptionists who were extremely kind, caring and helpful with every question and concern I had. The wait was not long and we were seen by Dr. Divya whom had personally come to get us and escort us into the examination room. In short, Dr. Divya was tremendous and incredibly patient with my son. My son is extremely uncooperative and fears doctor’s offices. He was already whimpering when we entered the doctor’s office. Dr. Divya took her time and made sure he was comfortable with her going near him every time she needed to use a new tool/device to check the overall health of his eyes. Dr. Divya prioritized my son’s comfort and made sure while she was checking his eyes he understands that he’s in good hands with her. This was the first time a doctor such as Dr. Divya who made me feel comfortable and relieved as a mother who desperately wanted to make sure my son’s eyes and overall health is well.

Dr. Divya is a one of kind and a wonderful pediatric ophthalmologist. I would highly recommend Metropolitan Vision Downtown to any parent who needs an ophthalmologist for their child.

originalText.text: Dr. Nandwani and their staff are awesome! My first visit was so pleasant and easy! I would recommend anyone to come to this place to get their eyes examined! They also remind you of your appointment!!! Thank you so much!!!

originalText.text: Always have the best service here, staff is very courteous.  Dr. Jung is very attentive and gives great advice.
